title: Custom Form Troubleshooting
body_html:
Context: This page documents troubleshooting steps and findings regarding the integration between Gravity Forms (WordPress) and Constant Contact in the context of the Lift Superstore.

Summary of Findings

  • Gravity Forms logs confirm that all API activity was limited to form submissions and authentication.
  • The Gravity Forms API key used was only capable of submitting data to Constant Contact—not modifying, disabling, or interfering with drip campaigns or other automation within Constant Contact.
  • Tests confirmed submissions were functional, as transactional emails were received after form use.
  • The reported customer issue (drip campaign no longer functioning) is not related to the lift height calculator

Conclusion

  • No evidence was found that the Gravity Forms API key or integration could have interrupted Constant Contact’s drip campaigns.

Documented for Lift Superstore by Emmanuel, April 2025.
